OOC: Due to the fact the word "Ki" be taken in DbZ effect this is a Rewrite. 
If you wonder how Koj over rode the Chip effect.  Good Vs. Evil that 
something one controls on the inside the chip magifyed his fears to the 
brink of madness and loss of hope but Koj was no going fail even if only one 
dead women that believe in him there for sanity is with reach as long a he 
focuses on that. So you the chip in a since was beaten by the love of a 
woman.))

::Koj::
"Thanks Lilly" As his seal of the Silver Dragon appears on his armor. Koj 
reaches in his own chest plate into the sword wound making it larger and 
removes the chip as the blood flows freely.

::Inu-Yasha::

Streams under slayer trying to catch Snowcat if she will let him. "Taxi for 
One?" Inu thinks Koj a Dragon Master who would have guessed he's so not like 
any of the others in the books.


::Master Koj of the Silver Dragon::

Is surrounded by a clam peace of mind knowing the truth. Koj take the tekno 
Fang and streams down trying to Slice Prebon open."This time you die" Koj 
see the missile heading for Ramulus. Koj hits the Ground and reset breaking 
off his attack On Prebon "Damn Tekno Rangs" Spins two Triangles off his 
Lance that Rip through the missiles before they reach Ramulus. "Lunarpine 
I'll handle the fight out here get Ramulus on Inu your the only on that can 
treat his wounds and Snowcats." As the Rangs return to the lance. Koj 
standing infornt of Lunarpine and Ramulus. Koj turns to face the trainners. 
As Koj Focus on the enegry he stole when he hit prebon the chest wound stops 
leaking as starts to return into just a stab wound. "I suggest you leave you 
can't beat me Prebon."
